text.autoconfig.ec_lec_plugin.option.bat: Material tool damage is added to this

text.autoconfig.ec_lec_plugin.option.dia:
Weather this material is applied to every part of a shield
with one item verses using one for each of the five parts

A list of what materials this one can replace on a shield.
Leave empty if it can replace anything
Defines the percent of Damage a shield entirely made of this material will block after the Base amount has been blocked
Only works if Shield Protection Percentage is enabled in the Shield Protection Settings
Defines the amount of Damage a shield entirely made of this material will block
Only works if PREDEFINED_AMMOUNT is selected in the Shield Protection Settings
this is the possible locations in a shield that this material can be placed when crafting
this is the amount of durability added by each of the five sections, onto the base wood shield durability
This is used as the base durability for weapons, which is multiplied with the weapons durability multiplier to get the final durability
The enchantability of shields and half of a gauntlet's
Added to the vanilla base mending multiplier of 2
The enchantability of weapons and half of a gauntlet's
used for gauntlet damage and also added to melee weapon base damage
Can Arrow Be Tipped With Potions
used when firing a bow or crossbow
text.autoconfig.ec_lec_plugin.option.enc: Katana Base Number of block-able arrows
Can be applied to gauntlets, chestplate, leggings, and boots
When on gauntlets, attack speed increases by 0.02, and mining speed by 0.2 for each level
When on chestplate, adds a chance to doge an attack before it hits. (due to function that determines the chance the max level before chance decreases is 25)
When on leggings, adds 0.1 jump strength per level
When on boots, adds 0.1 movement speed per level
Can be applied to katanas and shields
When on katanas, the number of consecutive blocked arrows increases by 1 for each level
When on shields, their blocking gets increased. different amounts for each shield blocking type. does nothing when on vanilla shield mechanics
For every level the dmg percentage grows by 5% of standard hit dmg. Allowed to go above 100%, the base dmg for slam is 90% of standard hit
For every 2 levels the number of hits between each slam gets reduced by one
For every 3 levels the range gets extended by one block

text.autoconfig.ec_lec_plugin.option.scy: Material tool damage is added to this
text.autoconfig.ec_lec_plugin.option.shi: If disabled alongside shield protection percentage, shields will no longer block anything unless vanilla protection is activated
If disabled alongside shield base protection, shields will no longer block anything unless vanilla protection is activated
DURABILITY_PERCENTAGE: the more durability left on the shield, the more damage is blocked
INVERTED_DURABILITY_PERCENTAGE: the less durability left on the shield, the more damage is blocked
PREDEFINED_AMMOUNT: the amount defined in the individual shield configs is blocked the rest hits the player
